statements.select: select COUNT(*) icount ,sum(sales_qty) sales_total_qty ,sum(sales_amount) sales_total_amount From @TmpTable;

select a.order_date ,b.unit_name ,a.unit_id ,a.sales_qty ,a.sales_amount ,a.row_no From @TmpTable a left join t_unit b on(a.unit_id = b.unit_id) where 1=1 and a.row_no > #StartRow# and a.row_no <= #EndRow# order by a.sales_amount desc,a.order_date

select a.order_id ,a.create_time ,a.sales_user ,a.order_no ,(select vip_name From t_vip where vip_id = a.vip_no) vip_no ,'' payment_name ,convert(decimal(18,4),a.total_amount*a.red_flag) total_amount ,(select user_name From t_user where user_id = a.create_user_id) create_user_name From t_inout a where 1=1 and a.order_type_id = '1F0A100C42484454BAEA211D4C14B80F' and a.order_reason_id = '2F6891A2194A4BBAB6F17B4C99A6C6F5' and a.order_date = #OrderDate# and a.unit_id = #UnitId# order by a.total_amount desc;
